properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Never further than thy Cross Never higher than thy feet Here earth's precious things seem dross Here earth's bitter things grow sweet{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Gazing thus our sin we see Learn thy love while gazing thus Sin which laid the Cross on Thee Love which bore the Cross for us{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Here we learn to serve and give And rejoicing self deny Here we gather love to live Here we gather faith to die{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Symbols of our liberty And our service here unite Captives by Thy Cross set free Soldiers of Thy cross we fight{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pressing onwards as we can Still to this our hearts must tend Where our earliest hopes began There our last aspirings end{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Till amid the hosts of light We in thee redeemed complete Through Thy Cross made pure and white Cast our crowns before Thy feet{/lang-eng}
